main event: A round, star-like object was observed in the sky near San Jose, California on June 15, 1963.
interesting points: The object was observed for 12-15 minutes, maneuvering and disappearing below the horizon.
The object was described as having the color of a star.
There was heavy haze over the San Jose area at the time of the sighting.
The observer claimed to be a qualified Army/Navy observer.
Multiple sightings of similar objects were reported in the San Jose area over a period of several days in June and July 1963.
